resources.string: Enter the code that you received from your provider
"To avoid errors, this screen can't be exited while setup is in progress"
You should already be signed up with the network
No other operator can be activated on this device, unless you reset your operators.
This operator cannot be removed from this device, unless you reset your operators.
You can reset your operator at any time in Settings, but this will remove all operators from your device.
%1$s has prepared a downloadable eSIM for your device. By continuing, you agree to the operator policy from %1$s:
Choose the operator that you already have an account with and want to use on this phone
"To use other numbers or networks, you'll first need to free up space by deleting 1 or more existing numbers in Settings"
To use other numbers or networks, contact your network providers for help
To use other numbers or networks, activate them later in Settings
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
"To use other numbers, you'll first need to free up space by deleting existing numbers from this device. You can do this later in Settings."
"To use other numbers or networks, you'll first need to free up space by deleting existing numbers from this device. You can do this later in Settings."
To use other numbers, contact %1$s for help at %2$s. You may need the EID number for this device:
To use other numbers or networks, contact %1$s for help at %2$s. You may need the EID number for this device:
To use other numbers or networks, contact your network provider for help. You may need the EID number for this device:
To use other numbers or networks, contact %1$s for help. You may need the EID number for this device:
To use other numbers, contact your network provider for help. You may need the EID number for this device:
To use other numbers, contact %1$s for help at %2$s
To use other numbers or networks, contact %1$s for help at %2$s
To use other numbers or networks, contact your network provider for help
To use other numbers or networks, contact %1$s for help
To use other numbers, contact your network provider for help
To use other numbers, contact %1$s for help
To use other numbers, contact %1$s for help. You may need the EID number for this device:
Your number should be ready to use.
"To finish activating %1$s, you'll need to download the %2$s app. For now, let's finish setting up your phone."
"To finish activating %1$s, you'll need to download your network provider's app. For now, let's finish setting up your phone."
"To finish activating %1$s, you'll need to download your network provider's app"
"To finish activating your number, you'll need to download the %1$s app. For now, let's finish setting up your phone."
"To finish activating your number, you'll need to download your network provider's app. For now, let's finish setting up your phone."
"To finish activating your number, you'll need to download your network provider's app"
"To finish activating your number, you'll need to download the %1$s app"
"To finish activating %1$s, you'll need to download the %2$s app"
To use other numbers, activate them later in Settings
To use other numbers or networks, activate them later in Settings
Once transferred, %1$s will no longer work on your old device. You can transfer a second number after setup by inserting a SIM card.
Once transferred, %1$s will no longer work on your old device
Enter the confirmation code that your operator gave you. This step is required by your operator.
Enter the confirmation code that %1$s gave you. This step is required by your operator.
After the number transfers, it will no longer work on your old device
Choose your call, text & data preferences
Your numbers should be ready to use
Ask %1$s if this device can be unlocked.
Enter your device password to continue.

"This device will be immediately disconnected from the network.
This won't cancel any mobile service plans."

"This device will be immediately disconnected from %1$s.
This won't cancel any mobile service plans."
Something went wrong and your operator could not be disabled.
"The eSIM can't be downloaded due to an error. Try again, and if the problem continues, contact %1$s."
"The eSIM can't be downloaded due to an error. Try again, and if the problem continues, contact your operator."
This takes a minute or two, sometimes longer
%1$d numbers are available on this device, but only one can be used at a time
You can use 2 numbers on this device at once. %1$s is already active.
Choose your active SIM or use 2 SIMs at once
To use mobile data, call features and SMS at a later time, go to your network settings
%1$s will be used for mobile data, calls and SMS.
QR code for EID is not available.

"This device will connect to %1$s instead of %2$s.
This won't cancel any mobile service plans."

"This device will connect to %1$s instead of the inserted SIM card.
This won't cancel any mobile service plans."

"This device will connect to the inserted SIM card instead of %1$s.
This won't cancel any mobile service plans."
"Due to the %1$s operator policy, you won't be able to enable this new operator unless you first reset your operators."
"The operator can't be switched due to an error."

"Erasing this SIM removes %1$s service from this device.
Service for %1$s won't be cancelled."

"This SIM can't be erased due to an error.
Restart your device and try again."
Connect to your mobile network by downloading the info that’s usually on a SIM card. This replaces standard SIM cards and is just as safe.
Your operator may ask for the following EID number, which identifies this phone:
"Don't see your number? Contact %1$s for help at %2$s"
If one of your operators has more numbers than you expected, contact them for help
"Don't see your number? Contact %1$s for help."
"If you didn't expect %3$d numbers, contact %1$s for help at %2$s"
"If you didn't expect %2$d numbers, contact %1$s for help"
"If you didn't expect %2$d numbers, contact %1$s for help. You may need the EID number for this device:"
Having trouble scanning your QR code? %1$s
You can also connect to your network by %1$s
Still stuck? Contact your network provider for help at %1$s
Still stuck? Contact your network provider for help
Look for your QR code on a piece of paper included with your device or in an email from your network provider.
If you have a SIM card, insert it now
Have a QR code from your operator? %1$s
Choose a way to securely activate your number on this device
"You'll need to sign in with your %1$s username and password"
Licences cannot be found due to an error.
"Look for your QR code on a piece of paper included with your device or in an email from your operator. Add an operator later if you don't have a QR code."
"You'll need it to download your SIM"
"You can't add an operator unless you first connect to Wi‑Fi."
Mobile service will resume after restarting.
Mobile service will resume after update
Something went wrong while trying to activate your numbers. Please contact your network providers for help.
You may need the EID number for this device:
By continuing, you allow %1$s to verify info that identifies this device on the network.
Turning off %1$s switches your active operator to %2$s.

"Only one SIM can be active at a time.
Switching to %1$s won't cancel your %2$s service."

"Only one downloaded SIM can be active at a time.
Switching to %1$s won't cancel your %2$s service."

"Only one SIM can be active at a time.
Switching won't cancel your %1$s service."
This may take a few minutes
Something went wrong with your camera. Please try again later.
If your operator gave you a QR code, scan it now by keeping the code centred in the box
If %1$s gave you a QR code, scan it now by keeping the code centred in the box
If your network provider gave you a QR code, scan it now by keeping the code centred in the box
Add operator with a QR code

"This device will no longer be able to connect to %1$s.
This won't cancel any mobile service plans."

"This device will be immediately disconnected from %1$s.
This won't cancel any mobile service plans."
"Due to %1$s operator policy, you won't be able to delete this operator unless you reset your operators."
Something went wrong and your operator could not be deleted.
"You may need to complete an additional step to activate service "
"If you don't have service, contact %1$s for help"
"If you don't have service, contact your operator for help"
"Erase all your operators from your device? You can't undo this action."
Something went wrong and your operators could not be reset.
"This won't cancel any mobile service plans."
This will remove all operators from your device:
To use a new SIM card, remove the one that’s currently in the device
If you have a SIM card, insert it now
Use the %1$s operator app to set up calls, texts and data.
"Unfortunately, your service can't be activated at the moment. To complete setup, contact %1$s for help at %2$s."
To activate service, contact %1$s for help at %2$s
To activate service, contact your operator for help
To activate service, contact %1$s for help
"Unfortunately, your service can't be activated at the moment."
Unfortunately, something went wrong and no phone number was added
"Unfortunately, your %1$s service can't be activated at the moment."
Your mobile network will be disconnected for now
Use Wi‑Fi to download your SIM
This allows you to use another network
"This won't cancel any mobile service plans."
To connect to %2$s instead of %1$s, remove your %1$s SIM card and try again.
To switch from %1$s, remove your %1$s SIM card and try again.
Tap to finish activating your other SIM
Ready to use 2 SIMs at once
"This device can have 2 SIMs active at once. To continue using 1 SIM at a time, tap 'No thanks'."
To get started, restart your device. Then you can add another SIM.
"Unfortunately, service can't be activated at the moment. Please try again later."
Choose a way to transfer your %1$s number
Get the %1$s app to set up your number
Some operators require a confirmation code for extra security. Your code might be on a piece of paper that came with your device, or it might be in an email from your operator.
